title: Update declined-state spoiler line text

requirements.text: In `frontend/src/App.tsx`, update the declined-state italic line that currently reads `(Spoiler alert: You're going to say yes eventually anyway!)` to exactly: `Chup chap bol" YES""`. Apply this change only within the declined state UI and leave all other text, layout, styles, and behavior unchanged.

quotes: change the "(Spoiler alert: You're going to say yes eventually anyway!)" to "Chup chap bol" YES"""

acceptanceCriteria: When the user clicks the reject option and the declined state is shown, the italic line displays exactly `Chup chap bol" YES""`.
The original `(Spoiler alert: You're going to say yes eventually anyway!)` text no longer appears anywhere in the declined state.
No other declined-state elements (headline, other paragraphs, emoji, reset button) change.

constraints: Frontend files listed as immutable must not be modified: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Keep the change scoped to the declined state in `frontend/src/App.tsx` only.
nonGoals: Do not change any other copy in the initial or accepted states.
Do not change styling, animations, button behavior, or assets.
